pr_title: Make monitor API configurable in dashboard

timeline.message:
Make monitor API configurable in dashboard

Signed-off-by: Steven Sheehy <steven.sheehy@hedera.com>

timeline.bodyText: if there is no monitorAddress field in json, would this overwrite the default with some empty/null value?
timeline.author: apeksharma

replies.bodyText: Fixed. Tested with values "", null and empty json {}
replies.author: steven-sheehy

timeline.bodyText:
in future, might be worth putting it in separate function and have tests for it.
Also would have been better just crashing if parsing/loading config fails like in our importer/grpc/etc, but meh, this is still just a simple component.
lgtm.
timeline.author: apeksharma
